# Sample Bibliography

Brown, A., Green, B., & Blue, C. (2021). Climate change impacts on coastal ecosystems: A comprehensive meta-analysis. _Environmental Science Quarterly_, 45(3), 234-267. https://doi.org/10.1234/esq.2021.45.3.234

Clean Air Act. (1970). 42 U.S.C. §7401 et seq.

Davis, R. (2020). _Understanding global warming: A primer_. Academic Press.

Digital Library Association. (2023, March 15). _Guidelines for digital citations_. Retrieved from https://www.dla.org/guidelines

García, M. (2020a). Renewable energy solutions for developing nations. _International Journal of Sustainable Development_, 12(4), 445-467.

García, M. (2020b). Solar panel efficiency in tropical climates. _Renewable Energy Review_, 8(2), 123-145.

García, M. (2021). Wind power potential in Latin America. _Energy Policy_, 15(7), 789-812.

García, M. (2023). _The future of green energy_. Universidad Press.

Johnson, K., & Williams, P. (2022). Temperature rise and sea level correlations: Evidence from Pacific islands. _Nature Climate Change_, 12(2), 123-124. https://doi.org/10.1038/nclimate2022

Law 123/2022. Environmental Protection Amendment Act. Government Gazette, No. 45678.

Miller, D., & Thompson, S. (2023). Arctic ice melt acceleration: A five-year study. _Journal of Glaciology_, 69(275), 456-478.

Müller, H., & Schmidt, K. (2022). _European climate policy: Challenges and opportunities_. EU Publications Office.

Peterson, L., Anderson, M., Wilson, R., & Taylor, J. (2022). Biodiversity loss in urban environments. _Urban Ecology_, 34(5), 567-589.

Rodríguez, C., & López, A. (2023). Impactos del cambio climático en América Latina. _Revista Latinoamericana de Estudios Ambientales_, 28(3), 234-256.

Smith, J. (2023). _The climate crisis: Understanding the emergency_. Princeton University Press.

UNESCO. (2021). _Education for sustainable development goals: Learning objectives_. United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization.

United Nations. (2022). _Sustainable Development Goals Report 2022_. UN Publications.

World Health Organization. (2023). _Climate change and health: A global assessment_. WHO Press.

Anderson, K., Roberts, M., Clark, D., & Evans, P. (2023). Marine ecosystem responses to warming oceans. _Marine Biology International_, 78(4), 234-256.

Thompson, R. (in press). Future projections for global temperature rise. _Climate Dynamics_.

Williams, P. (2000). Historical climate patterns in the 20th century. _Historical Climatology_, 23(1), 12-34.
